title.narrative: Assistance in conducting transparent elections in Kyrgyzstan 2015

description.narrative: The parlamentary elections in Kyrgyzstan will be held in 2015. Parliament is very important for the development of Kyrgyzstan to confirm stability pluralism and the country's democratic development. In 2014 the President signed an amendment initiatited by an initiative of a group in the Parliaments. The current form of the change in the law could lead to official censorship in Kyrgyzstan. Media is an essential part of the electoral campaigns. Through the media voters have the opportunity to adequate informa tion on the voting processes and policies.Activities:1.Analysis of the Law ?On Elections in the KR.2.Monitoring of the printed media both in Russian and Kyrgyz languages. Development of methodology to conduct in-house trainings the use of depleted recommen dations and identifying groups of journalists and mass media.3.Development of methodology for monitoring the media prior to the election. As well as monitoring of Media during the coverage of the election. Comparative analysis of the situation in the media .4.Negotiations with the CEC to establish an effective and objective Commission which will include representatives of the media and civil sector.5.Preparation and publication of a report on the monitoring results.6.Presentation discussion of results of mon itoring held during the elections
